Nahetu
Ganthagocchaka
Ganthaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Nahetu
5.
1625Noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—  ahetukaṃ noganthaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe (yāva asaññasattā), vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
<< 5.1.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Naārammaṇādi >>
